build.name: Name
build.noItemFoundDesc: I know, it's hard to remember them all.

about.title: About
about.text: SULFUR Lab is a fan-made, browser-based tool created for players who want to plan, experiment with, and share their weapon builds. It allows you to design your ideal loadout by combining attachments and enchantments in an intuitive interface. Once you're satisfied, you can generate a compact share code to save your build or easily send it to friends.

copyrightNotice.title: Copyright Notice
copyrightNotice.text: SULFUR Lab is an independent, non-commercial fan project created for informational and educational purposes only. We do not claim ownership of any SULFUR intellectual property and are not affiliated with, endorsed by, or officially connected to the SULFUR development team in any way.

donate.title: Donate
donate.text: If you find it helpful and want to support, please consider supporting this project. Every support helps keep the lab running!

ItemAttributes/EnchantmentBlindAoe_itemD: Blinds surrounding enemies as well as yourself
ItemAttributes/EnchantmentSelfDamage_ite: Do self damage on each bullet
ItemAttributes/ProjectileApplyCharm_item: Bullets get a chance to charm the target, making it fight for you.
ItemAttributes/ProjectileApplyCrusader_i: Increases damage on target for every bullet hit.
ItemAttributes/ProjectileApplyFear_itemD: Adds a chance to fear target on hit
ItemAttributes/ProjectileApplyFire_itemD: Chance to set target on fire
ItemAttributes/ProjectileApplyPetrificat: Adds a chance to petrify a unit, turning it to stone. Petrified units cannot take damage, and deflect incoming bullets.
ItemAttributes/ProjectileApplyVoodoo_ite: Bullets link targets together. Linked targets share a percentage of their damage taken.
ItemAttributes/ProjectileChaosStrike_ite: Chance to increase dark damage up to
ItemAttributes/ProjectileOnHitAftershock: Adds chance to shock the area on hit, stunning nearby units.
ItemAttributes/ProjectileOnHitCorpseExpl: Increases corpse explosion power per hit.
ItemAttributes/ProjectileOnHitExplosionR: Bullets become rockets that explode on impact
ItemAttributes/ProjectileOnHitLava_itemD: Spawns lava on hit that burns targets
ItemAttributes/ProjectileOnHitNoxiosaClo: Creates a cloud of deadly poison on hit
ItemAttributes/ProjectileOnHitStormSurge: Creates a deadly discharge of electricity on hit that can damage multiple targets.
Items/Attachment_A12CMuzzleBrake_flavor: A muzzle device designed to lower the spread of guns. Compatible with most barrels.
Items/Attachment_AssaultScope_flavor: A firearm optic with an 4x zoom factor, designed to be effective both in close and long range engagements.
Items/Attachment_BarrelExtension2i_flavo: A 2" multi-caliber, multi-threaded muzzle attachment designed to increase the length of a firearm barrel, thereby making any gun shoot more precisely.
Items/Attachment_BarrelExtension4i_flavo: A 4" multi-caliber, multi-threaded muzzle attachment designed to increase the length of a firearm barrel, thereby making any gun shoot more precisely.
Items/Attachment_BarrelExtension6i_flavo: A 6" multi-caliber, multi-threaded muzzle attachment designed to increase the length of a firearm barrel, thereby making any gun shoot more precisely.
Items/Attachment_BreznikBMDTactical_flav: A muzzle device designed to lower the recoil and spread of guns. Compatible with most barrels.
Items/Attachment_BreznikBMD_flavor: A muzzle device designed to lower the recoil and spread of guns. Compatible with most barrels.
Items/Attachment_CompactSight_flavor: A small optic with an 2x zoom factor, designed to be effective both in close to medium range engagements.
Items/Attachment_ShroudedBarrelExtension: A muzzle device designed to lower the recoil and spread of guns. Compatible with most barrels.
Items/Attachment_ImprovisedBarrelExtensi: A makeshift muzzle device that can reduce spread and recoil somewhat. Fits most barrels.
Items/Attachment_GunCrank_flavor: A mechanical device that can turn any semi automatic gun fully automatic.
Items/Attachment_HauklandFlashHider_flav: The historical Haukland best seller. A Haukland customer once famously won "free Haukland Flash Hiders for life", and this largely contributed to the company's eventual bankruptcy.
Items/Attachment_HolographicSight_flavor: A compact collimator sight with an illuminated reticle for quicker target acquisition. Fits standard rails.
Items/Attachment_HuntingScope_flavor: A firearm optic with an 8x zoom factor, designed for use by hunters.
Items/Attachment_Insurance_flavor: When you lose a weapon this is attached to, it will drop out of the church collection box. One use only!
Items/Attachment_LaserSightGreen_flavor: A tactical device with a built in laser module allowing for more accurate hip fire. Compatible with most guns. This one emits green light.
Items/Attachment_LaserSightRed_flavor: A tactical device with a built in laser module allowing for more accurate hip fire. Compatible with most guns. This one emits red light.
Items/Attachment_LaserSightYellow_flavor: A tactical device with a built in laser module allowing for more accurate hip fire. Compatible with most guns. This one emits yellow light.
Items/Attachment_PrimingBolt_flavor: This mechanical device is constructed to provide extra force to the primer ignition of a firearm, increasing bullet velocity and reducing tumbling at the cost of forcing it to fire in semi automatic.
Items/Attachment_ReconScope_flavor: A long range rifle optic with an 12x zoom factor, designed for use by snipers.
Items/Attachment_ReflexSight_flavor: An open red dot sight that aids in target acquisition. Compatible with most guns.
Items/Attachment_SniperScope_flavor:
A long range means of communication with a 
12x zoom factor, designed for use by snipers 
to deliver words of encouragement and love.
Items/Attachment_Suppressor556_flavor: A muzzle device designed to lower the sound signature of a firearm. Made by the Haukland Company.
Items/Attachment_Suppressor762_flavor: A muzzle device designed to lower the sound signature of a firearm. Produced as a response to the Haukland Company discontinuing their production line of silencers.
Items/Attachment_Suppressor9mm_flavor: A muzzle device designed to lower the sound signature of a firearm. Made only in small amounts to be used by radio operators during the night raids of the first robot war.
Items/Attachment_SuppressorCan_flavor: An improvised sound suppressor fashioned from a tin can.
Items/Attachment_WarmageCompensator_flav: A muzzle device designed to lower the recoil and spread of guns. Compatible with most barrels.
Items/Consumable_ChamberChisel12ga_flavo: A toolkit containing everything needed to rebore a firearm barrel, changing the weapon's caliber to 12 gauge.
Items/Consumable_ChamberChisel50BMG_flav: A toolkit containing everything needed to rebore a firearm barrel, changing the weapon's caliber to .50 BMG.
Items/Consumable_ChamberChisel556_flavor: A toolkit containing everything needed to rebore a firearm barrel, changing the weapon's caliber to 5.56mm.
Items/Consumable_ChamberChisel762_flavor: A toolkit containing everything needed to rebore a firearm barrel, changing the weapon's caliber to 7.62mm.
Items/Consumable_ChamberChisel9mm_flavor: A toolkit containing everything needed to rebore a firearm barrel, changing the weapon's caliber to 9mm.
Items/Enchantment_ChainLightning_flavor: How long can this go on?
Items/Item_AddBanish_flavor: Allows you to one additional Banish in the Endless. (Current amount BANISH_X)
Items/Item_AddChoiceDraw_flavor: Allows you one additional choice in the Endless. (Current amount CHOICEDRAW_X)
Items/Item_AddReroll_flavor: Allows you one additional Re-roll in the Endless. (Current amount REROLLS_X)
Items/Item_AdmiralWhiteXstrong_flavor: A traditional tobacco product containing nicotine that is usually enjoyed by placing it under ones upper lip.
Items/Item_AirBat_flavor: Unfathomably fly sneaks sporting bat wings.
Items/Item_AmuletOld_flavor: A strange urge to go back radiates from this artifact.
Items/Item_Amulet_flavor: A strange urge to go back radiates from this artifact.
Items/Item_Aspic_flavor: Random food trapped inside jelly for all eternity.
Items/Item_AssWheel_flavor: A competent alternative to the skateboard that for some reason didn't sell very well.
Items/Item_BadassVest_flavor: A vest clad with spikes and symbols. It shows that you have been a lot of places and seen a lot of things.
Items/Item_Balaklava_flavor: Worn by skiers and bank robbers all over the world!
Items/Item_BallisticHelmet_flavor: A sloped military helmet made of steel and strengthened with several layers of aramid fabric.
Items/Item_BallisticVest_flavor: A state of the art ballistic vest with interwoven layers of kevlar and cordura fibers.
Items/Item_BananaBread_flavor: A chimera of wheat and banana, where the plains meet the tropics.
Items/Item_BananaPeel_flavor:
Was food. Now trash. 

Might be slippery if stepped on.
Items/Item_BananaSulfs_flavor: The bacon of the banana candy world.
Items/Item_Banana_flavor: An elongated, edible fruit. Botanically a berry. Produced by several kinds of large herbaceous flowering plants in the genus Musa.
Items/Item_BandanaBlue_flavor: A folded sheet of cloth that can be worn either on the top of ones head, or as a face covering. Its color signifies allegiance.
Items/Item_BandanaRed_flavor: A folded sheet of cloth that can be worn either on the top of ones head, or as a face covering. Its color signifies allegiance.
Items/Item_BaptismalFont_flavor: Exorcise any enchantments and oils from your weapon by soaking them in this holy water.
Items/Item_BarkBread_flavor: A loaf of bread made from bark instead of flour. Filling but not very nourishing.
Items/Item_Bark_flavor: Tree husk, brittle enough to be crumbled into sawdust.
Items/Item_Bathrobe_flavor: Highly absorbant morning wear made out of towel.
Items/Item_Beanie_flavor: Style is surprisingly fresh, might have some cultural significance.
Items/Item_Beans_flavor: The mummies of food, made to be conserved in prepper basements everywhere for eons, or until the world ends.
Items/Item_BeefJerky_flavor: Dried and seasoned protein, most commonly from mammal origin. Responsible for creating truck drivers all over the world.
Items/Item_BeerHelmet_flavor: For when you are thirsty, but your hands are occupied with saving the world.
Items/Item_Berries_flavor: Sweet and sour colorful tiny fruits.
Items/Item_BiscuitsAndGravy_flavor: White gravy with sausage squeezed tight between two loaves of bread. Exquisite.
Items/Item_BlackPepper_flavor: The black gold of millenia. Great to mix with liquid for broths, makes food tastier.
Items/Item_Bladder_flavor: Used to store pee, now you store it. Or it's in a store.
Items/Item_BlastBoot_flavor: Boot designed to cause explosion when stomped hard. Designed not to hurt the wearer.
Items/Item_Bleach_flavor: Classic album. Decent anime. Also removes stains.
Items/Item_Blindfold_flavor: A strip of cloth tied into a crude blindfold.
Items/Item_BloodBag_flavor: A plastic bag containing a little over half a liter of human blood of the type O-. Can be used for transfusions to any recipient, no matter their blood type.
Items/Item_BloodPudding_flavor: Fried, crispy, but juicy on the inside. Enjoyed by cattle farming humans in cold biomes. Simply referred to as "Blodpudding"
Items/Item_Blood_flavor: A vial of fresh, scarlet blood. Thicker than water.
Items/Item_BlueSlipper_flavor: Almost a shoe, sort of. Made for relaxing moments by the pool, and other relaxation related areas.
Items/Item_BobaTea_flavor: The pumpkin spice latte of teas.
Items/Item_Bomb_flavor: A kit of plastic explosives (C4), wired up to detonate after sixty seconds following activation via a six digit code.
Items/Item_Bone_flavor: Important part of the structure of most animals.
Items/Item_Boomerang2_flavor: An obscure piece of merch made in an old Haukland marketing campaign, the highly dangerous BOOMerang is a thrown weapon, designed to hit several enemies in a row before exploding, dealing massive damage.
Items/Item_Boomerang_flavor: A flat airfoil shaped wooden instrument that can be thrown, dealing damage to whatever it hits. A skilled boomerang thrower can make it return back to its user.
Items/Item_Bottle_flavor: A small bottle of glass that can be closed with a cork.
Items/Item_BottledScream_flavor: A glass bottle containing the scream of a dead princess. If opened, the princess' wrath will return on whatever is close.
Items/Item_BottledWater_flavor: A 0.5L PET Bottle of water. It's half empty.
Items/Item_Brain_flavor: The mind is a terrible thing to waste.
Items/Item_Bread_flavor: A loaf of freshly baked bread made of yeast, flour and water.
Items/Item_Breastplate_flavor: A cumbersome plate of polished steel that protects the wearer's torso.
Items/Item_Broth_flavor: A healthy, warm and soothing broth. Salty.
Items/Item_BulkAmmoBox_flavor: Military surplus ammo box where you can buy ammo in bulk! At a reduced price!
Items/Item_Butter_flavor: Cow's milk that has been churned into thick butter.
Items/Item_ButtermilkPancakes_flavor: A stack of thick and fluffy pancakes drizzled with syrup. These pancakes a tendency to stick to the roof of your mouth.
Items/Item_Cacao_flavor: This bitter powder is not very tasty on its own, but great for baking and sweet treats.
Items/Item_CactusDrink_flavor: A stilldrink made with cactus and cane sugar.
Items/Item_CactusGrilled_flavor:
Smokey, juicy, sweet. 

The word cactus derives from an ancient word for 'spiny'. A plant whose identity is not certain.
Items/Item_CactusSweets_flavor: Sweet pastilles that lack any resemblence to real-life natural flavors.
Items/Item_Cactus_flavor: The word cactus derives from an ancient word for 'spiny'. A plant whose identity is not certain.
Items/Item_Caltrops_flavor: An area of denial weapon made of sharp nails arranged in such a manner that one of them always points upward from a stable base. Deals damage to whomever steps on them.
Items/Item_CamoJacket_flavor: Woodland pattern camouflage jacket. Makes you blend in in the woods, or in the crowd at a Rage Against the Machine concert.
Items/Item_CandyCane_flavor: Striped candy with a pronounced bend, for display purposes.
Items/Item_Cap_flavor: Basic headwear designed to keep the sun, as well as CCTV cameras, out of your face.
Items/Item_Cappuccino_flavor: A fluffy kind of latte with fluffed up milk. Comes with a candy on the side, if you're not full.
Items/Item_CaviarBottle_flavor: Food consisting of salt-cured roe, also known as fish eggs.
Items/Item_Cencer_flavor: An ornate, brass cencer containing incences of various holy herbs and spices. Using it will cleanse the area, making any Demons nearby move slower.
Items/Item_Cevapi_flavor: Small meat turds put inside a bread cut like a Pac-person. Onions on the side.
Items/Item_Cheese_flavor: Very tasty on its own. Or with bread. Smelly humans love it.
Items/Item_Cheeseburger_flavor: A sandwich consisting of fillings, usually a patty of ground meat, typically from animals, placed inside a sliced bun or bread roll
Items/Item_ChestOfDrawers_flavor: Socks in the bottom, underwear in the top.
Items/Item_ChickenLeg_flavor:
Must be cooked before eaten, or you might contract salmonella or helicobacter pylori. 

"Tastes like frog legs!"
Items/Item_ChickenNashvilleHot_flavor: Cayenne, fried and hot. Looks really good! Should try it sometime!
Items/Item_ChocolateBall_flavor: Name has been under scrutiny. A source of great tension between the pearl sugar and coconut flake camps.
Items/Item_Chrismatory_flavor: Alchemical station. Reroll any oil in here, for a price.
Items/Item_ChristmasSock_flavor: This is not the intended purpose.
Items/Item_ChristmasSpice_flavor: Powdered christmas spirit used for making things jolly.
Items/Item_ChristmasSweater_flavor: Ugly all year except during the holidays.
Items/Item_ChristmatoryRefresh_flavor: Resets the inflated cost of using the Chrismatory back to it's original cost.
Items/Item_ClergyCollar_flavor: A black shirt with a white Roman collar. You have worn this shirt for as long as you can remember.
Items/Item_ClimbingGear_flavor: A set of paracord, pick axes and climbing spikes may be used to climb back up, should you suffer a steep fall.
Items/Item_Clog_flavor: Traditional footwear designed for easy equipping and superior toe protection.
Items/Item_Cloth_flavor: Bits of cloth of various sizes.
Items/Item_CombatBoots_flavor: Sturdy footwear intended for use by soldiers.
Items/Item_CordonBleu_flavor: Insanely fancy western maki rolls with chicken.
Items/Item_CottonCandy_flavor:
Sugar with sugar that processed to be fluffy. 

Like one-dimensional firework for the senses.
Items/Item_CottonSwab_flavor: Practical when new. Horrible when used.
Items/Item_CowboyBoot_flavor: Made for boying cows, or signaling a generally country lifestyle.
Items/Item_CowboyHat_flavor: But you can't be any geek off the street, gotta be handy with the steel, if you know what I mean, earn your keep.
Items/Item_CowboyVest_flavor: Leather vest with fringes, so that others easily can see what direction you were riding in photos.
Items/Item_CrawEye_flavor: Their eerie yellow glow reminds you of something...
Items/Item_CrawFlesh_flavor: Known to the Shav'Wa as dark poulet. Tastes a bit like frog legs.
Items/Item_CrawSkin_flavor: The oily feathers repel water and insulates.
Items/Item_Crown_flavor: A dusty old crown, probably worn by some ancient king or queen. Most likely valuable.
Items/Item_CryptKey_flavor: The design seems too intricate for any type of casual use.
Items/Item_CuissesDeGrenouille_flavor: Famous dish, also known as frog legs.
Items/Item_CultistHeart_flavor: You can only serve the Black Guild for so long before the nature of it starts eating at you.
Items/Item_Curry_flavor: Spicy fluid of variable viscosity with some type of meaty chunks mixed in. Often splooched over rice.
Items/Item_Currywurst_flavor: Say auf Wiedersehen to your hunger with this sausage, fries and curry ketchup combo.
Items/Item_Darklamp_description: At the start of each floor, summon a random companion from an unlocked area.
Items/Item_Darklamp_flavor: When you need a friend and any friend will do.
Items/Item_DeathsFavor_flavor: A red rose given to those who have provided the Reaper a favor. How will he pay you back?
Items/Item_DeliveryDemonRefresh_flavor: Resets the inflated cost of using the Delivery Demon back to it's original cost.
Items/Item_DeliveryDemon_flavor: Unlocks a DHell representative in the church that will refresh the stores of all the congregation members.
Items/Item_DenimJacket_flavor: Timeless and robust jacket. For both work, and everyday use.
Items/Item_DetectivePipe_flavor: When you absolutely, elementary got to discombobulate every motherfucker in the room, accept no substitutes.
Items/Item_Dimmie_flavor: A single dimmie, not enough to share with your mate.
Items/Item_DisgustingCookbook_flavor: Cooked food is rare within the Sulfur. This foul recipe book will let you know how to get by when all you have to eat are fresh corpses.
Items/Item_DishSoap_flavor: For when the food insists on staying on your stuff, even though the meal is over.
Items/Item_DivingMask_flavor: A set of plastic goggles, with a covering for the user's nose, that are designed to allow for unhindered vision underwater.
Items/Item_DogEye_flavor: Sounds a bit like the name for a flower, but upon closer examination it is certainly not.
Items/Item_DogFlesh_flavor: A sizable part of man's best friend.
Items/Item_DogSkin_flavor: Would look great on a dog!
Items/Item_DogWhistle_description: Summons a dog companion at the start of each floor
Items/Item_DogWhistle_flavor: A wooden whistle that can be blown to summon a trusted hound companion to your side.
Items/Item_Dogtags_flavor: Metal tag on a chain with your info on it. Pracitical for identifying you when your face is missing, and/or you are incapacitated.
Items/Item_DoppIGrytan_flavor: Bread soaked in whatever was left when you cooked ham. What a concept.
Items/Item_DoubleCheeseburger_flavor: A burger, with burger topping on top.
Items/Item_DunceCap_flavor: Casual nylon headwear that only works on certain people.
Items/Item_EarProtectors_flavor: Plastic earmuffs that are worn in loud environments to reduce damage to the user's hearing.
Items/Item_EggToddy_flavor: Sugar, eggs and booze. One of santas favourites.
Items/Item_Egg_flavor: An uncooked egg. Could be eaten raw or used in cooking.
Items/Item_EncryptedHoodie_flavor: It will lead you there. It leads them there. Let it spread.
Items/Item_Escargot_flavor:
Boiled snails, usually with herbs and garlic. Technically mollusks and therefore classified as seafood. 

Famous dish, also known as simply "eating snails".
Items/Item_ExtraLung_flavor: A makeshift rebreather fashioned out of someone's lung and a plastic straw.
Items/Item_EyePatch_flavor: The only conversation starter you will ever need.
Items/Item_FalseSulfcap_flavor: This mushroom emits a faint glow and reeks of sulf sap. Easily mistaken for the Sulfcap, it carries a potent poison.
Items/Item_FatbergChunk_flavor:
A rock-like mass of waste formed in sewers by the combination of non-biodegradable solids and fat. 

Eating not advised.
Items/Item_FirefighterHelmet_flavor: Sturdy head protection made of heavy duty plastic that has been reinforced with plexiglass. Its insulation protects the wearer from heat.
Items/Item_FirefighterJacket_flavor: Heavy jacket that doesn't burn very well. This makes it a popular choice for firefighters.
Items/Item_FirstAidKit_flavor: A plastic box containing instruments needed to provide basic first aid, including gauze, scissors, painkillers, and disinfectant spray.
Items/Item_FishNChips_flavor: Deep growing root, featuring animal from the deep. Both deep fried. That's deep man.
Items/Item_FishSalted_flavor: Fish cured with dry salt. Preserved for later eating.
Items/Item_Fish_flavor: An uncooked fish. May be cooked or eaten raw if prepared correctly.
Items/Item_FishingRod_flavor: A wooden fishing pole with reel and bait. Used to catch fish in bodies of water.
Items/Item_Flour_flavor:
Someone worked long and hard to separate the wheat from the chaff. Then crushed into a fine powder. 

Useful in baking.
Items/Item_FluffyHat_flavor: An adorable ushanka made of polyester and synthetic sheep's fur.
Items/Item_Fondue_flavor: Melted cheese dish served in a communal pot. In some human tribes has become a tradition for every occation.
Items/Item_FourleafClover_flavor: A rare variation of the much more common three-leaf clover. Superstitions say it brings luck to its bearer.
Items/Item_FrenchToast_flavor: Sliced bread soaked in beaten eggs then pan fried.
Items/Item_FrogLeg_flavor: Might be usable for potions or exotic Human dishes.
Items/Item_FrogmanFoot_flavor: Finlike footwear made of rubber and polymer to aid propulsion while diving. Their awkward design significantly impairs movement on land.
Items/Item_FullEnglishBreakfast_flavor: The more handsome and successful older brother of the half english breakfast.
Items/Item_FunnyGas_flavor: A plastic inhaler containing an unknown hallucinogen gas. It is said that the high disturbs the user's perception of time.
Items/Item_GasMask_flavor: A CBRN rated gas mask designed to protect the wearer from chemical, bacterial, radiological and nuclear hazards.
Items/Item_GenieShoe_flavor: The magic lifting these shoes can allow the wearer to fly... for a bit.
Items/Item_Geta_flavor: Traditional footwear that makes ninjas faster, and westerners perplexed.
Items/Item_GoblinEye_flavor: Its irridencent pupils lets them see very well in dark depths.
Items/Item_GravadLax_flavor: Apparently it's "cured", so what's with the grave thing?
Items/Item_Gravy_flavor: A white, brown, or gray standard sauce.
Items/Item_GrilledPoultry_flavor: Cooked bird of ambiguous origin. For people who enjoy challenging things.
Items/Item_GumHubba_flavor: A fruit flavoured gum, sweet and chewy.
Items/Item_GunCabinet_flavor: State of the art Haukland gun storage salvaged from their factory.
Items/Item_Haggis_flavor: Traditional scottish eat-ception. What's not to like?
Items/Item_HardBread_flavor: Flat and dry crispbread. Rich in fiber.
Items/Item_HardHat_flavor: The best worksite insurance is a good helmet.
Items/Item_HardshellTaco_flavor: A beef taco in a hard shell.
Items/Item_HauklandMembershipCard_flavor: The holder of this card has proven that they know their way around firearms.
Items/Item_HazmatSuit_flavor: A protective suit, that stops many invisible, and some visible, hazards from gaining access to your skin.
Items/Item_HealthPotion_flavor: A restorative potion of sacred herbs and electrolytes. Colored red with food dye.
Items/Item_Heart_flavor: The ticker. Used to keep everything going nice and steady.
Items/Item_HedgehogSuit_flavor: Protects your back somewhat, just be careful so you don't accidentally poke someone's eye out.
Items/Item_Herb_flavor: Will help many dishes and treats become something extra.
Items/Item_HerbalTea_flavor: Plants dipped in hot water. Namaste.
Items/Item_HighHeel_flavor: Fashion item, created for no other purpose than protecting the heel from ants.
Items/Item_HighQualityElfShoe_flavor: Vintage. Made from real leather, with real metal bells, worn by a real elf. Non of that jokeshop felt halloween bullshit.
Items/Item_HockeyArmor_flavor: Plastic armor protecting the users torso. Carries a distinct odour.
Items/Item_HockeyHelmet_flavor: A plastic helmet made to reduce blunt damage taken in the sport of Hockey.
Items/Item_HolorealityProjector_flavor: Generates an interactible projection of a random friend you've met along the way.
Items/Item_HolyToast_flavor: A toasted slice of bread is showing holy signs. Researchers call the phenomenon face pareidolia.
Items/Item_HolyWater_Old_flavor: A small container of water that has been blessed by the clergy.
Items/Item_HolyWater_flavor: A small container of water that has been blessed by the clergy.
Items/Item_HoodieSklett_flavor: A yellow hoodie with a mysterious symbol. What could it mean?
Items/Item_HoodieSpectre_flavor: A sweatshirt made mostly of polyester. Printed on is the logo of a great musician.
Items/Item_HotPot_flavor: Cook while you eat? What a concept!
Items/Item_HotSauce_flavor: A condiment made from spicy fruits and other ingredients.
Items/Item_HumanSkin_flavor: The biggest organ in the human body. Congratulations, skin!
Items/Item_HuntingVest_flavor: Lots of pockets, to store all that macho in.
Items/Item_IceSkate_flavor: A steel skate fastened to the sole of a leather boot allows for fast movement across ice.
Items/Item_InstantDefibrilator_descripti: In case your health should reach zero instead it's set to 50. The item is consumed.
Items/Item_InstantDefibrilator_flavor: Gives you cat like powers. If that cat has died seven times already.
Items/Item_Intestines_flavor: A series of tubes and chambers where food goes to die.
Items/Item_IronFeather_description: 120% increased damage while in the air
Items/Item_IronFeather_flavor: Medal awarded to the few surviving paratrooper snipers of the second robot war.
Items/Item_JamUnsweetened_flavor: Berries crushed and boiled. Fruity, but not as sweet as you would expect.
Items/Item_Jam_flavor: Berries crushed and boiled with sugar. Sweet and fruity.
Items/Item_JanssonsTemptation_flavor: One of the few named legendary traditional foods. Soulbound to Jansson.
Items/Item_Jello_flavor: A nine for presentation, a four for taste, and a one for nutrition.
Items/Item_JetPack_flavor: A device worn on the back which uses jets to propel the wearer through the air. Use with caution.
Items/Item_Julmust_flavor: The last bastion of drinks to beat out a certain massive company as the main carbonated drink for christmas related activities.
Items/Item_JuniperBranch_flavor: A small branch of juniper. The cold climate in which it grows lingers within the branch. Anything that hits the bearer becomes frozen in ice.
Items/Item_KarlOskar_flavor: A large bolete mushroom. Origin of name unknown.
Items/Item_KidneyPie_flavor: Freshly baked and smells of ammonia and salts. Popular among elderly people with strong accents.
Items/Item_KidneyStone_flavor: Suprisingly hard. Full of salts and minerals.
Items/Item_Kidney_flavor: Filters your blood from all that bad stuff. Also makes piss!
Items/Item_KneePads_flavor: Protective gear used to cushion the impact when falling to the ground, and provide padding while kneeling.
Items/Item_KnightsHelmet_flavor: Heavy and cumbersome medieval style helmet. Date of origin unknown.
Items/Item_Kombucha_flavor: A drink made from symbiotic fermentation of sugared tea in symbiotic culture of bacteria and yeast.
Items/Item_Latte_flavor: Milk and coffee sitting in a tree, D-R-I-N-K-M-E.
Items/Item_LeatherJacket_flavor: "You think I'm going to stay here with you in this sin wagon?"
Items/Item_Lemonade_flavor: A hydrating sweet drink with a soothing bitterness.
Items/Item_Leverpastej_flavor: A human classic liver pt to put on sandwiches. Great with butter and pickles.
Items/Item_LibraryCard_flavor: Access to a world of knowledge. If you manage to shut the fuck up while you're in there.
Items/Item_LightningInABottle_flavor: Essence of Lightning, miraculously captured within a bottle.
Items/Item_Liquor_flavor: 40% distilled alcohol. Harms your health, makes you feel different.
Items/Item_LiverDumpling_flavor: A dumpling filled with some kind of pat. It's punctured.
Items/Item_Liver_flavor: Provided extremely important functions to its original owner.
Items/Item_LizardBladder_flavor: A unique bladder system to the Shav'Wa, that generates scented secretions for social bonding, a psychotropic liquid for ritualistic sedation, and plain old classic pee.
Items/Item_LizardEye_flavor: Back when it was plugged in, it blinked from the underside in that cool lizard sort of way.
Items/Item_LizardFlesh_flavor: Smells like... sweet fish. Hard to describe.
Items/Item_LoadedDice_description: Rerolls your loot result 3x times, and awards you with the most valuable.
Items/Item_LoadedDice_flavor: If you ain't cheating, you ain't trying.
Items/Item_LockOfTheMagus_description: Gives 100x more experience on the next kill. Consumed on use.
Items/Item_LockOfTheMagus_flavor: You know it's blonde. He knows it's blonde. But you better not say it to his face.
Items/Item_Lung_flavor: Used to give, and take, someones breath away.
Items/Item_Lussekatt_flavor: A saffron spiced wheat bun topped with two raisins that represent the gouged out eyes of Saint Lucia. It's really yummy, they say.
Items/Item_Lutfisk_flavor: Hyper conserved, double dipped mutliple times and forged in corrosive liquids to become the ultimate fish.
Items/Item_MacNCheese_flavor: Pasta and a cheese sauce. Traditional dinner from a cardboard-box.
Items/Item_Maki_flavor: Made from white rice formed into rolls with seaweed and cut into cylindrical shapes..
Items/Item_Marshmallow_flavor: Nerf version of a sugar cube. The amount you can keep in your mouth at any one time is used by humans to establish dominance around the campfire.
Items/Item_MashedPotatoes_flavor: Tubers mashed up with delicious buttermilk.
Items/Item_MatchaGum_flavor:
A matcha flavoured gum, sweet and tingling for the senses. 

Chewing this will make you feel confident wielding a sword.
Items/Item_MatchaTeaCup_flavor: Drinking this will make you feel confident wielding a sword.
Items/Item_MatchaTeaPowder_flavor: Smells wonderfully. Can be used to make green tea, or green tea flavored treats.
Items/Item_MeatSkewers_flavor: Has a musky, sour smell. Seems edible.
Items/Item_Meringue_flavor: Crunchy. Made from egg whites and sugar.
Items/Item_MetabulatorPump_flavor: Runs your digestive system through a special device that does magic enzyme shit and makes you absorb neutrients extrordinarily fast.
Items/Item_MetalDetector_flavor: Originally created by the military to sweep for land mines, this instrument can be used to detect the nearby presence of metal buried in the ground.
Items/Item_MetalScrap_flavor: Various metal scraps, screws and bolts.
Items/Item_MicrofiberDishCloth_flavor: The most science of cloths. Removes dust by touch.
Items/Item_MilitaryHelmet_flavor: A high-end bulletproof helmet of a titanium composite. Has fittings for NVGs and other tactical equipment.
Items/Item_MilkBlue_flavor:
A daily treat of governmentally funded propaganda. 

Now with even less fat!
Items/Item_MilkButtermilk_flavor:
A product from the leftovers of cheese production. 

Great for baking, according to some cultures.
Items/Item_MilkGreen_flavor:
A daily treat of governmentally funded propaganda. 

Now with less fat!
Items/Item_MilkRed_flavor: A daily treat of governmentally funded propaganda.
Items/Item_MilkshakeBerries_flavor: One sip takes you back to that time at the roller rink in the 1950's. Atleast it would have if you were alive then, probably.
Items/Item_MilkshakeChocolate_flavor: The dessert you always order, but are too full to finish.
Items/Item_MineralWater_flavor: A 0.5L PET Bottle containing pure spring water with trace amounts of essential minerals. It's half empty.
Items/Item_MonkeyPaw_flavor: A partially decomposed, severed arm of a monkey. It's twisted fingers are said to grant wishes when snapped.
Items/Item_MotorcycleHelmet_flavor: Head protection made of plastic and kevlar. Not bullet proof, but may help to cushion a blow.
Items/Item_Mudcake_flavor: Has a rich chocolate taste. Usually a mix of cacao, sugar, eggs, flour and butter.
Items/Item_MushroomFried_flavor: Tender and melts on your tongue.
Items/Item_MushroomOmelette_flavor: Eggs and mushrooms. Ooh the texture! Great with salt.
Items/Item_Mutagen_flavor: A chemical agent capable of inducing changes in DNA causing mutations.
Items/Item_MycotaSquamata_flavor: A large morel favoured by lizards. Originates from dark swamplands.
Items/Item_MysteryMeat_flavor: An easy and simple way to eat several meats at once! A human classic!
Items/Item_Nigiri_flavor: Sliced raw fish served on top of a mount or ball of vinegared rice
Items/Item_Nuggets_flavor: A tiny amount of chicken wrapped in an large amount of deep fried flour.
Items/Item_NutMix_flavor: A bag with mixed nuts. Healhty combo of fat and protein.
Items/Item_NutSpread_flavor: Nuts have been ground and worked into a thick spread.
Items/Item_Oats_flavor: Great for baking or making porridge.
Items/Item_OfficeShirt_flavor: "Rick, have you ever heard the expression "The customer is always right"?"
Items/Item_OilLamp_flavor: A magical oil lamp containing a Genie that will grant you three wishes.
Items/Item_OldTimeySuit_flavor: The original owner won't be needing this anymore. It's probably at least a hundred years old.
Items/Item_Omelette_flavor: You can't make an omelette without breaking a few eggs.
Items/Item_Onigiri_flavor: Made from white rice formed into triangular or cylindrical shapes and often wrapped in seaweed.
Items/Item_Painting1_flavor: Will hold and present one fabulous item of your choosing.
Items/Item_Painting2_flavor: Will hold and present one fabulous item of your choosing.
Items/Item_Painting3_flavor: Will hold and present one fabulous item of your choosing.
Items/Item_Painting4_flavor: Will hold and present one fabulous item of your choosing.
Items/Item_Pancreas_flavor: In this little factory, beta cells work tirelessly to create insulin for the host. If you don't have diabetes that is.
Items/Item_PastaBolognese_flavor: Pasta and beef ragu sauce topped with fresh basil.
Items/Item_PeanutButter_flavor: Peanuts have been ground and worked into a thick spread. Rich in fat and protein.
Items/Item_Peanut_flavor: Easy to crack. Tasty and nutritious.
Items/Item_PegLeg_flavor: Instead of a leg. Gives an unfair advantage against stepping-on-things-related incidents.
Items/Item_PillowArmor_flavor: Improvised armor. Usually used by young people doing backyard stunts.
Items/Item_PineNut_flavor: Cones with nuts inside. What a concept!
Items/Item_PizzaLarge_flavor: A large pizza. Will make you feel stuffed. It's better to slice it.
Items/Item_PizzaSlice_flavor: A perfect slice of crispy, tender, savory pizza.
Items/Item_PlateCarrier_flavor: Protective body armor with ceramic plate inserts in the front and back side.
Items/Item_PlatformShoe_flavor: When you wish you were a little bit taller.
Items/Item_PocketSand_flavor: A fistful of sand kept in your pocket can be used to blind a foe for a short duration.
Items/Item_PoisonGum_flavor: Doesn't taste great but can be an antidote to toxins.
Items/Item_PoliceHat_flavor: Dead or alive, you're coming with me.
Items/Item_PoliceUniform_flavor: With great power comes great responsibility.
Items/Item_Polsa_flavor:
Traditional northern recipe containing tendons, heart, lung or liver, usually from beef or moose, mixed with grains. 

Plsa is not to be confused with plse.
Items/Item_Polse_flavor: A mass produced hotdog type popular in flat countries.
Items/Item_Porridge_flavor: A foul smelling slop of Corpseflower Oats and Goblin Milk.
Items/Item_PotatoSalad_flavor: Small squares of boiled potatoes, stuck in some sort of white slime.
Items/Item_Potato_flavor: The root of all roots. Edible but better nutrient value when cooked.
Items/Item_Poutine_flavor: The laziest excuse for a dish.
Items/Item_PowerBar_flavor: When you need something to keep you going between your important meeting and picking up your dry cleaning.
Items/Item_PrisonKey_flavor: A sulfurite key that unlocks the gate leading to the Lower Prison.
Items/Item_PyttIPanna_flavor: Diced everything, with some extra on top!
Items/Item_Raclette_flavor: Molten cheese slithered over some potatoes. Likely served with some olives or cured meats.
Items/Item_RamenTori_flavor: A warm, rich broth with chewy noodles.
Items/Item_Ramen_flavor: A warm, rich broth with chewy noodles.
Items/Item_RangeFinder_description: 15% increased damage to Sniper class weapons
Items/Item_RangeFinder_flavor: Golf equipment. Also used by marksmen to kill better.
Items/Item_RatCage_flavor: A cage containing a very hungry pet rat. Let it out every once in a while to eat corpses to make it grow big and strong.
Items/Item_RazorBlossom_flavor: A beautiful, rare flower said to grow on the highest peaks of the Seventh Circle. Its petals are so sharp that enemy melee attackers get hurt upon touching you.
Items/Item_Razorang_flavor: An airfoil fitted with razors that can be thrown, dealing damage to whatever it hits. It's capable of hitting several targets in a row before returning to the thrower.
Items/Item_Refrigerator_flavor: A nice place to store food, or other stuff. Keeps your heads cool.
Items/Item_RhubarbPie_flavor: Decimated rhubarb, resting in peace under a cover of delicious sugary dough.
Items/Item_RhubarbPorridge_flavor: Porridge topped with a sauce that is both sour and sweet. Seems this mashup can't seem to make up it's mind.
Items/Item_RhubarbSauce_flavor: Destoyed rhubarb mixed with sugar, presented in a bowl.
Items/Item_Rhubarb_flavor: Astrologers proclaim the week of the rhubarb. All dwellings increase population.
Items/Item_Rice_flavor: Bag of rice. Hard to digest when uncooked. Will swell up in contact with water, please don't feed it to birds, it might swell in their stomachs and they can get sick!
Items/Item_Risalamalta_flavor: Rice pudding with some fruit or some shit.
Items/Item_RobotBrain_flavor: State of the art technology. Contains 1x personality.
Items/Item_RobotControlUnit_flavor: Ever wonder where robots get their motor skills? Here's the answer.
Items/Item_RobotEye_flavor: Hi-tech camera device with full interface for quantum interpretation.
Items/Item_RobotFlesh_flavor: I guess you could call it that...
Items/Item_RobotHeart_flavor: A PowerCore containing pure maximum grade sulfur. Synchronizes all signals in a celestial robot.
Items/Item_RobotHydraul_flavor: Gives mechanics a weighty snap and power when needed for quick reactions.
Items/Item_RobotJoint_flavor: The tendons of the robot world.
Items/Item_RobotPlate_flavor: Extremely tough and durable plate made from unidentifed exotic metals.
Items/Item_RobotSeptacoil_flavor: Gives robots that springy step, or that recoily force.
Items/Item_RobotSoulCapsule_flavor: Part of the juice that runs it all, neatly bundled in one reinforced glass canister.
Items/Item_Rock_flavor: If you put somethig between this and a hard place it might be physically altered, or at least pressured.
Items/Item_RodsoppPaste_flavor: Touching it gives you the feeling that time is slowing down...
Items/Item_Rodsopp_flavor: This mushroom stings to the touch, but emits a pleasant, metallic odor. It makes you feel slightly woozy, but can probably be used in cooking.
Items/Item_Rollerblade_flavor: A singular plastic rollerblade. The wheels under the sole allows for quick movement across smooth ground.
Items/Item_RoundGlasses_flavor: Thin framed, circular eyewear that will surely accentuate your artistic soul.
Items/Item_RubberBoot_flavor: Protects your feet from wetness, and being friends with the cool kids.
Items/Item_Rubber_flavor: A useful material made of natural polymer of isoprene and elastomer. Might be dialectically  synonomous with human household objects.
Items/Item_RudolfNose_flavor: A genetically mutated nose that lights your way, or atleast I think it is.
Items/Item_RunningShoes_flavor: Ergonomic and sleek. Perfect for running long distances.
Items/Item_Safe_flavor: Will keep valuables in, and greedy hands out.
Items/Item_SafetyVest_flavor: Reflective safety vest that ensures that you're seen by traffic.
Items/Item_Salt_flavor: The white gold of millenia. Great to mix with liquid for broths, making foods tastier.
Items/Item_SamuraiArmor_flavor: When I swing my swords, they all choppable.
Items/Item_SandFish_flavor: An uncooked fish. May be cooked or eaten raw if prepared correctly.
Items/Item_SandwichBread_flavor: Not the best thing that happened from sliced bread.
Items/Item_SandwichButter_flavor: Best thing that happened from sliced bread. Chewy and savory.
Items/Item_SandwichCheese_flavor: Best thing that happened from sliced bread. Chewy and savory.
Items/Item_SandwichLeverpastej_flavor: If you're in the mood for liver - then you're in for a treat.
Items/Item_SandwichNutSpread_flavor: Might be a bit gluey to the roof of your mouth. Very nutiritious.
Items/Item_SantaHat_flavor: Shows your allegiance to The Red One and his legions of elves.
Items/Item_Sashimi_flavor: Delicacy consisting of fresh raw fish sliced into thin pieces.
Items/Item_SausageOmelette_flavor: You can't make a sausage omelette without breaking a few pigs.
Items/Item_SausageOnStick_flavor: Or a meatsickle, if you wish.
Items/Item_SausageSoup_flavor: When you absolutely, positively got to eat sausages with a spoon, accept no substitutes.
Items/Item_ScubaTank_flavor: Small handheld oxygen tank, useful mostly for emergencies or short dives.
Items/Item_Seaweed_flavor: Dried edible seaweed used in cooking, made from species of the red algae genus. It has a strong and distinctive flavor, and is often used to wrap around rice, like onigiri.
Items/Item_SheriffBadge_flavor: A badge made out of a seemingly cheap metal, but it's all one needs to get the confidence of a proper gunslinger.
Items/Item_ShieldBelt_flavor: A user activated shield belt that is capable of deflecting everything from bullets to lasers.
Items/Item_Shovel_flavor: A wooden shovel with a metal headpiece made for excavating dirt by hand.
Items/Item_ShrewSkin_flavor: It's so dry it almost breaks when handled.
Items/Item_ShrinkRay_flavor: A robot device capable of breaking down and reforming molecular structures to become smaller. Used to weaken enemy forces before attacking.
Items/Item_Shurikens_flavor: A supplementary weapon in any samurai's arsenal, these "throwing stars" can be utilized for a quick, silent kill.
Items/Item_SkiGoggles_flavor: Tinted eyewear held to the wearer's face by an elastic strap. Helps to block out sunlight and reduce risk the impact of snow blindness.
Items/Item_SmokeGrenade_flavor: A canister containing white phosphorus and random pigments. Upon exploding, a cloud of smoke is produced that can be used for hiding or screening movement. Commonly used as a signaling tool in warfare.
Items/Item_Snail_flavor: Cold and slimey. Not very appetizing. Might contain lungworms.
Items/Item_SnakeBasket_flavor: Trendy storage unit that despite the name does not include any snakes. It does have a lot of snake storing potential though.
Items/Item_Snus_flavor: Traditional tobacco product, dispersed into the bloodstream through small bags you put under your lip.
Items/Item_Sock_flavor: Ah, so that's where it went. Now where's the other one?
Items/Item_Soda_flavor: A sweet, carbonated beverage in an aluminium can. Lime flavor.
Items/Item_Solution_flavor: A liquid with many purposes. Might be the solution you need.
Items/Item_Spagetti_flavor: Packet containing noodles made of wheat flour and eggs.
Items/Item_SpanishOmelette_flavor: You went to order a bready taco something, but all you got was this lousy omelette.
Items/Item_SpiceMix_flavor: An exotic mix of spices that can be used for many purposes.
Items/Item_Spleen_flavor: A must have for any blood user.
Items/Item_SportsDrink_flavor: A 0.5L PET Bottle of finest sports drink filled to the brim with electrolytes, caffeine and essential minerals.
Items/Item_SpringCoilBoots_flavor: Springs attached to the sole allows the wearer to jump higher. First marketed as a mountain climbing gadget, later recalled. This pair has a name tag that reads 'Albiin'.
Items/Item_SquareGlasses_flavor: Hey, just like the ones Kevin wears! No wait, his are round.
Items/Item_SteelHelmet_flavor: A mass produced helmet of steel, capable of stopping low caliber bullets from entering at certain angles of attack. Its previous owner left a playing card strapped to its side.
Items/Item_Stew_flavor: A healthy warm and soothing stew. Has a rich smell.
Items/Item_Stick_flavor: Nothing compares to a really good stick.
Items/Item_Stout_flavor: A very rich dark beer, that leaves a mustache.
Items/Item_StraightJacket_flavor: Typically worn by people who may cause harm to themselves or others, such as yourself.
Items/Item_Suitcase_flavor: A worn, traveled suitcase. Should hold many memories.
Items/Item_SulfurCap_flavor: A fourth wall-breaking cap. Really comfy and signifies that you have really exquisite taste in all things.
Items/Item_SulfurHoodie_flavor: A fourth wall-breaking hoodie. Really comfy and signifies that you have really exquisite taste in all things.
Items/Item_Sunglasses_flavor: Eyewear that blocks sunlight from entering your eyes. Has the added benefit of making literally anyone look cooler with them on.
Items/Item_Surstromming_flavor: Old fermented fish that tall blond people with funny accents claim to enjoy.
Items/Item_SuspensorShield_flavor: A state of the art robot invention, the suspensor shield is strapped around the user's waist and emits a bubble shield whenever a projectile comes close.
Items/Item_Svinto_flavor: Lathers and scrapes the stuff from your things. Very well.
Items/Item_SwedishPancakes_flavor:
Flat as a pancake? That's flattery to a Swedish Pancake. Thin and crispy. 

Don't worry, the first pancake is always a blob.
Items/Item_SwingDing_flavor: Small mushrooms rich in nitrogen. It finds popular use in potions.
Items/Item_SylvesterHat_flavor: A thin rubber cap worn by lighthouse keepers and talking bears.
Items/Item_TankerHelmet_flavor: Lightly armored headwear designed to be extremely shock resistant.
Items/Item_Thyroid_flavor: An organ roughly the shape of a certain rap group logo. Apparently secretes hormones all over your body? Yuck.
Items/Item_TitaniumHelmet_flavor: A heavy-duty combat helmet with an armored visor that provides the wearer excellent protection against bullet impacts and explosions.
Items/Item_ToastSkagen_flavor: Made to be eaten on a boat. But we will not hold it against you if you eat it here.
Items/Item_Toaster_flavor: A standard toaster that browns bread. Inflicts electric damage on enemies when hit.
Items/Item_Toilet_flavor: An interconnected watercloset where people do one's business. Things you put in here will end up in other toilets.
Items/Item_Toiletpaper_flavor: Toilet paper so coarse that it will remove any shit that needs wiping, and then some.
Items/Item_TongueOnStick_flavor: The french kiss of your worst nightmare.
Items/Item_Tongue_flavor: The talky lick muscle. Makes things taste like stuff.
Items/Item_TrappedAngel_flavor: A lesser angel trapped in a bottle. You can feel its raw power when touching the glass.
Items/Item_Tunic_flavor: A finely made tunic of spun wool. Does not give you Poison Resistance.
Items/Item_TurtleShell_flavor: Protects your back, but is a bit cumbersome. Make sure you warn others about the ricochets.
Items/Item_Unagi_flavor: Eel based dish, served on bed of rice. Gives electricity resistance due to tolerance training.
Items/Item_UsedRubber_flavor: A useful material, but probably not sanitary.
Items/Item_VacuumCleaner_flavor: A punsch roll wrapped in marzipan, both ends dipped in chocolate, the "vacuum cleaner" is a yummy treat to liven up bleak winter days.
Items/Item_VampireHeart_flavor: A still beating heart of a long dead vampire lord. Its mere presence seems corrupting to you.
Items/Item_VelvetBell_flavor: This meaty mushroom carries an earthy and nutty smell. Can be used in cooking.
Items/Item_Vibraport_flavor: An experimental piece of headware made by robots, capable of teleporting the user to a random, nearby position. Developed to improve already effective robot hit-and-run tactics.
Items/Item_VoodooDoll_flavor: A small effigy made to look like a specific creature. Infused with dark magic, stabbing it will hurt nearby enemies.
Items/Item_Wardrobe_flavor: While it ain't no door to Narnia, atleast it holds a lot of stuff!
Items/Item_WeaponRepairKit_flavor: Various tools and chemicals used to keep items in good condition.
Items/Item_WetWipes_flavor: Peace prize deserving invention for cleaning baby butts.
Items/Item_Wine_flavor: Red liquid made from trampled and fermented red grapes. Nice bouquet. Tastes a bit like Jesus.
Items/Item_WoodenArmor_flavor: Quite cumbersome wooden armor that seems almost reasonable.
Items/Item_WoodenCross_flavor: It's not very well made, but gets the point across.
Items/Item_Worm_flavor: "Eat it, I dare you. I'll give you 5 bucks!"
Items/Item_YaketySax_flavor: Saxophone with a classic sound designed specifically for fast forward whimsical moments
Items/Manual_ChequeredCookbook_flavor: The most basic ass cookbook imaginable. Contains all the information you need to feed yourself and your loved ones.
Items/Manual_CookingCastle_flavor: Things hard to pronounce and rich in calories
Items/Manual_CookingDungeon_flavor: Taste it before you judge it.
Items/Manual_CookingSewers_flavor: One man's trash, another man's treasure.
Items/Manual_DesertCooking_flavor: Can I eat this rock? Will this cactus kill me? Can I make something tasty with this scorpion carcass? Find out inside!
Items/Manual_ForestCooking_flavor: The woods are full of fantastic flavours and combinations if you know where to look.
Items/Manual_GoblinCooking_flavor: Turns out goblins aren't cannibals. Exclusively.
Items/ValuableCarStereo_flavor: The most valuable part of the car.
Items/ValuableCrawGuano_flavor: The most valuable poop in Sulfur.
Items/ValuableDVDPlayer_flavor: An ancient device used to watch Grumpy Old Men. These were often so complicated to set up that you would need to hire an installer.
Items/ValuableDiamondRing_flavor: If you like it then you should put a finger on it.
Items/ValuableDriversLicense_flavor: You should probably turn this in...
Items/ValuableFineChina_flavor: Used for drinking tea and taking up storage space.
Items/ValuableGamingLaptop_flavor: A portable computer with tons of migs and megs of memories. Runs all the latest games at 100 fps.
Items/ValuableGoldenFigurine_flavor: Someone probably deserved this for some reason. But now it's yours, most likely undeservingly.
Items/ValuableGoldenTicket_flavor: A mysterious ticket labeled "Gabba". Oh boy!
Items/ValuableMP3Player_flavor: Can store your parents entire vinyl discography. The future is bright!
Items/ValuableMinidisc_flavor: A lot more compact than the compact disc, but stores about the same amount of music!
Items/ValuableOldVintage_flavor: The label has faded. This bottle of wine is likely thousands of years old.
Items/ValuableOrnamentalVase_flavor: Looks old. There's nothing inside but profit.
Items/ValuablePokerChips_flavor: No longer an official currency since the first gangsta era ended. Still holds some value.
Items/ValuableQuaintLittleSpoon_flavor: Some were born with this in their mouths. Better wash it before you sell it.
Items/ValuableShavwaSoap_flavor: The color is suspiciously close to that of Shav'Wa skin.
Items/ValuableSmartphone_flavor: A mobile phone with a stronger processor than all the computers that put man on the moon, combined. Used by people to waste time.
Items/ValuableSoulResin_flavor: Soul debris that has been resting under heavy pressure for an extremely long time underground. Extracted and forged by the Hellshrew.
Items/ValuableTheCost_flavor: "You must present a pure soul to go through Heavens gates, Akratak. But it need not be your own."
Items/Weapon_Arbiter2_flavor: Marketed as the obvious next step in the evolution of sawn-off shotguns. This newer model features an arm brace that helps prevent fractures.
Items/Weapon_Augusta_flavor: An antique break-action, double-barrel shotgun that has been upgraded with an Ada kit and fashioned with scatter prisms.
Items/Weapon_Beck_flavor: A favorite among Dusian Metro Cops for its high rate of fire and erratic spread pattern.
Items/Weapon_Bo_description: Applies Stun on enemies with attacks from the Main Stance. Blocks any amount of ranged attacks during the spin of the attack in the Secondary Stance.
Items/Weapon_Bo_flavor: Nothing beats a good stick, especially a ninja stick.
Items/Weapon_Breacher8_description: Hold the trigger to load, release to fire.
Items/Weapon_Breacher8_flavor: A hydraulics assisted breaching shotgun. Model number denotes maximum shell capacity.
Items/Weapon_Bronco_flavor: A buck-action ranching gun, often found in the rough and tumble reaches of the outer circle.
Items/Weapon_BurnerPhone_flavor: This elusive artifact, shrouded in mystery, emanates an aura of secrecy and clandestine operations.
Items/Weapon_Catacoil_flavor: A laser sub machinegun once dubbed "the switchblade of personal defense weaponry" by Folks Magazine.
Items/Weapon_Corpsemaker_flavor: A machine gun made by the Haukland Company. Said to do double damage against Ghosts, but this is largely believed to be hearsay.
Items/Weapon_CryoGrenade_flavor: An experimental hand grenade that emits a shocking blast of cold on detonation. Slows or freezes enemies caught in its blast range.
Items/Weapon_D4RT_flavor: A break-action laser sniper rifle, it super-charges energy cells to deliver devastating damage at the cost of a short delay when pulling the trigger. Iconic for its wide use in the Christmas War.
Items/Weapon_DeathStar_flavor: Ease of use and reliability are the selling points here. The Deathstar PG was released to the public along side the Rektor during the Second Robot wars, and made for civilian use. Nicknamed "Piggybank" due to the shake maneuver needed to align the bullets thrown into the hatch.
Items/Weapon_Dirk_flavor: You have a feeling that you've held this gun before...
Items/Weapon_Dolphin99_flavor: Made largely out of repurposed sheet metal, this .50 BMG rifle features a massive spring with a draw force of over 400 newtons. The magazine "kick-forward" is said to have been inspired by the way Dolphins jump along the ocean's surface.
Items/Weapon_Drifter9_flavor: A hand crafted sub machinegun with a body and foregrip made out of driftwood.
Items/Weapon_Duhar_flavor: A light machinegun featuring double barrels, this gun that is essentially two guns packed into one has circulated heavily in recent border clashes on the 4th circle.
Items/Weapon_Dynamite_flavor: A highly explosive red stick with a fuse. Useful both in mining as well as general destruction.
Items/Weapon_Farsight_flavor: Semi-automatic foldable marksman rifle inspired by Japanese minimal housing. The manual claims that the barrel is not compatible with FM radio, even though it appears to be.
Items/Weapon_Ferryman_flavor: A compact anti-materiel submachine gun designed for tank crews. This daring weapon of war was a last ditch attempt by Thomas Haukland to garner an upswing in profits, but that ultimately led to the company's bankruptcy.
Items/Weapon_FlickerZip_flavor: Very portable weapon. Seems to be specificly designed to make people quit smoking, once and for all.
Items/Weapon_Flock_flavor: The gentlemans automatic shotgun. A compact piece where the magazine doubles as a grip handle to compensate for the recoil. As the pellets travel such a miniscule distance in the barrel, this gun is especially good for those who need to hit many targets in a panic, or would prefer to aim a bit sporadically.
Items/Weapon_Gravekeeper_flavor: A very early magazine-based pistol. Made by the Haukland Company.
Items/Weapon_HellnBack_flavor:
Man made weapons designed to be wielded by worse monsters. Are you a man or a monster? Rovin', chillin', killin'.
The black pistol deals more damage than the gray one, effectively making every other shot deadlier.
Items/Weapon_ImpalaGravita_flavor: The highly requested mix between gun and bow, that everyone wanted. It gives the user the option to set the trigger power on the fly, making the arc of the shots depend on the users needs. The further the draw string pulls the piston back before release the faster and longer the bullet will travel.
Items/Weapon_JarOfLove_flavor: Charm enemies with their hearts' contents.
Items/Weapon_Katana_description: Will block one melee attack with the Secondary Stance. The thrust attack from the Secondary stance will induce a Bleed effect on the enemy.
Items/Weapon_Knop_flavor: A breech loaded, single-shot, small game hunting rifle.
Items/Weapon_Longboy_flavor: One of those modern sniper rifles that shoots very long. Has a retracting part of the barrel for recoil mitigation. Did I mention it was long?
Items/Weapon_M11Ramshack_flavor: An assault rifle developed for amphibious operations. The Fisk is entirerly watertight except for its door-shaped ejection port.
Items/Weapon_Majordome_flavor: Semi-automatic foldable shotgun inspired by Japanese minimal housing. The box in which it comes has a chibi mascot claiming "Lock & Fold!" as the main tagline.
Items/Weapon_Mario_flavor: An older model over-under shotgun. "They don't make 'em like they used to." has been crudely carved into the wooden backside of the stock.
Items/Weapon_MolotovCocktail_flavor: A repurposed liquor bottle containing a sticky mixture of gasoline and styrofoam that erupts into a fireball when thrown.
Items/Weapon_MoneyStack_flavor: This elusive artifact, shrouded in mystery, emanates an aura of secrecy and clandestine operations.
Items/Weapon_Mossman_flavor: Manufactured and used by mobsters during the first gangsta era.
Items/Weapon_NeuraxisF22_flavor: Crude laser machinegun based on the guts of spirit foam mining equipment. Made and used by the workers rebellion in the aftermath of the second robot war. Fires faster and more accurately the longer you rev the handle.
Items/Weapon_Nunchaku_description: Gripping, and transitions between stances can be used as timed parries. Any successful parry or strike will  add to a damage multiplier that counts down over time, encouraging frantic combat. Parrying also stuns!
Items/Weapon_Nunchaku_flavor: A very cool weapon that is as likely to hurt you, as it is to hurt anyone else
Items/Weapon_PalehorseTopclipper_flavor: "And I looked, and behold a pale horse: and his name that sat on him was Death, and Hades was following close behind him."
Items/Weapon_PierreFusil_flavor: Produced in a long line of battle rifles, per royal order of Queen Andrielle the Third. Her Majesty kept insisting that each iteration of the rifle still wasn't good enough for adoption in her Regal Corps, hence the high model number.
Items/Weapon_PineappleGrenade_flavor: A defensive fragmentation grenade designed to produce a deadly smattering of shrapnel on explosion. Use with extreme caution.
Items/Weapon_PloikaC_flavor: Features a patented dual casing ejection system that enables its extreme rate of fire.
Items/Weapon_PoisonGrenade_flavor: A mason jar that has been carefully filled with a number of nerve gas globules. Produces a deadly gas cloud on impact when thrown.
Items/Weapon_ProximityMine_flavor: An explosive charge contained in a metal device with an attached seismic sensor.
Items/Weapon_RamshackOld_flavor: Named after Colonel Ramshack who illuminated the need for a service rifle that would fit humans and robots equally well.
Items/Weapon_Ramshack_flavor: Named after Colonel Ramshack who illuminated the need for a service rifle that would fit humans and robots equally well.
Items/Weapon_Rektor_flavor: Issued to school principals during the second Robot War, the Rektor 100rd features a patented latching magazine box design to reduce reloading time.
Items/Weapon_Rokua_flavor: A polymer furnished sniper rifle named after a forest in the northern wetlands. The teal bakelite has been treated with an oil derived from Sugar Snakes for increased durabililty.
Items/Weapon_Sai_description: Will block two melee attacks with the Main Stance, and two ranged projectile with the Secondary Stance. Does a weak Stun when released from the Secondary Stance.
Items/Weapon_Salamander_flavor: While its initial purpose was aesthetic, a way to mix and match the colors of different components, the Salamander eventually turned into a favorite among clandestine agencies for its unmatched stealth potential, being snuck into high security locations.
Items/Weapon_Snut38_flavor: A revolutionary revolver design that can be quickly reloaded due to its detachable cylinder. This model is intended for use by police forces.
Items/Weapon_Socom9_flavor: Standard issue commando pistol marked "S9 Taxi Special".
Items/Weapon_StarAndWitness_flavor: Made entirely of plastic, these fantastic pistols are designed to be used akimbo style and to guard your life.
Items/Weapon_StickGrenade_flavor: A high explosive grenade for use in attacking defensive fortifications. Features a pull cord fuse design.
Items/Weapon_SulfurGrenade_flavor: Improvised from tangled False Sulfcaps and bits of scrap metal, this thrown explosive sticks to surfaces before detonating.
Items/Weapon_TailorMarksman_flavor: Designed and made in a sewing machine factory during the first robot war. Cocked easily by rotating the cylinder, which then shows the indicator in red. Known for its reliability.
Items/Weapon_Termite_flavor: Designed by Elias von Vrede, the M3 Termite is a sister project to his namesake gun. Its complex internal magazine, though covered by a small metal shroud, is vulnerable to dust and debris.
Items/Weapon_ThrowingKnives_flavor: Small, ultra lightweight knives designed for throwing. Has a loop at the end for easy storage in a belt.
Items/Weapon_Typhoon_flavor: A bullpup heavy assault rifle featuring a reciprocating recoil dampening system. Its metal housing makes it rather heavy to lug around.
Items/Weapon_Unknown_flavor: Not much is known about this laser weapon, hence the name, the only lead being the symbol on the side. They are quite rare due to all of them ever being found at the site of a huge explosion at a supposedly empty field in Sulfur that just left a few crates of these along with metal and robotic scrap parts. It does not seem to be made for human hands, but its size makes it a good backup piece.
Items/Weapon_Valet_flavor: Foldable SMG inspired by Japanese minimal housing. Falsely claims to fit in your pocket. Beware consumers.
Items/Weapon_Vrede_flavor: A sub machinegun designed by the late gunsmith Elias von Vrede. Is said to have turned the tide in the Third War for the Hellthrone.
Items/Weapon_Wakazashi_flavor: A mysterious sword. Why was this laying around?
Items/Weapon_WyattPulsar_flavor: An antique revolver heavily modified using several Ada kits. It can be fired in a semi auto fashion, or be slowly powered up to deal massive damage at the cost of more energy cells.
Items/Weapon_Wingman_flavor: This bird will make bullets fly.
Items/Weapon_Cavalier_flavor: Sporty gallop based burst pistol with a foldable stock for stability. The sound compensates for the lack of horse sounds, after horses were replaced by hoverboards during the third robot war.
ItemDescriptions/DynamicString_AlreadyKn: You already know AMOUNT_X recipe variants from this manual.
ItemDescriptions/DynamicString_Attribute: Gives VALUE_X ATTRIBUTE_X for DURATION_X seconds.
ItemDescriptions/DynamicString_HealthCon: Gives VALUE_X health over DURATION_X seconds.
ItemDescriptions/DynamicString_TeachesRe: Teaches you AMOUNT_X new recipe variants.
ItemDescriptions/Instruction_Attachment: Drag onto a weapon to modify it.
ItemDescriptions/Instruction_Enchantment: Drag this item onto a weapon with an empty enchantment slot to enchant it.
ItemDescriptions/Instruction_Repair: Drag onto an item to repair it.
